name: Zoopshie
description:
It was a casual day at the Zoo. People visit to enjoy the beautiful scenes. Suddenly, an accident happened in the zoo, all animals are rampaging while customers are still inside and the rarest endangered animal have been critically wounded. The player needs to get the vet and stop rampaging animals before it’s too late.

Your main strength is your companion, use the companion to save the animals by pulling them (RMB) and shoot the obstacles to save the people (LMB). Move freely around the map and avoid touching other animals to save yourself and your companion.

Zoopshie blends traditional Shmup and modern arcade games to create fun and casual gameplay. We want players to feel like taking care of their companion and the people while finding a way to do them both.
